Bash(./cosys_mission_env/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import sys
print(''Python path:'', sys.path)
print(''Python version:'', sys.version)
try:
    import msgpackrpc
    print(''✓ msgpackrpc imported successfully'')
    print(''msgpackrpc location:'', msgpackrpc.__file__)
except ImportError as e:
    print(''✗ msgpackrpc import failed:'', e)
    
try:
    import cosysairsim
    print(''✓ cosysairsim imported successfully'')
    print(''cosysairsim location:'', cosysairsim.__file__)
except ImportError as e:
    print(''✗ cosysairsim import failed:'', e)
")

import sys

print(''Python version:'', sys.version)
try:
    import msgpackrpc
    print(''SUCCESS: msgpackrpc imported successfully'')
    print(''msgpackrpc location:'', msgpackrpc.__file__)
except ImportError as e:

try:
    import cosysairsim
    print(''SUCCESS: cosysairsim imported successfully'')

except ImportError as e:
